content.rendered:

End-to-End Strength

Exceptional tensile power is offered by a Kevlar fiber core, nylon-braiding and precision laser welding. Syncwire Lightning Cable is constructed to face up to any yanking, twisting, stretching, or dropping that it would presumably be subjected to.
